greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1; a(n) = (largest prime factor of n) - 1.
comment: Also a(n) = Euler Phi of largest prime factor of n (previous name).
mathematica: a[n_] := EulerPhi[Last[FactorInteger[n]][[1]]]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 200}] (* _José María Grau Ribas_, Feb 21 2010 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==1, 1, vecmax(factor(n)[,1]) - 1); \\ after A006530; _Michel Marcus_, May 19 2015
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, May 07 2002
